channel.title: Documentation on DataPlane Broker
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on DataPlane Broker

item.title: DataPlane Broker Introduction
item.description: The role of the broker in NFV

item.title: Installation
item.description: How to install the three broker components: server, SSH client, and Ryu controllers

item.title: Configuration & invocation
item.description: How to configure and invoke DPB components

item.title: Management
item.description: Management operations include describing the network topology to the broker. The SSH client is used to configure network topology.

item.title: Control
item.description: Control operations include setting up and tearing down services. These can be invoked by SSH or REST.
